replies.body:
Hey YunaYunalesca,

As others have stated, please keep direct reporting to support tickets (as you have done) and not on the Boards. I have went ahead and snipped out the Summoner name from your post.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Keyru,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TNyQFikh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-22T23:29:09.330+0000)
>
> Hey YunaYunalesca,
> 
> As others have stated, please keep direct reporting to support tickets (as you have done) and not on the Boards. I have went ahead and snipped out the Summoner name from your post.

Sorry I did not know I will delete this asap :)
YOU CANNOT NAME AND SHAME ON THE BOARDS! Please read the Guidelines before posting.

Name and shame is not allowed, nobody cares, nobody here will ever encounter them.

Consider playing a different game if one person makes you react this strongly.
